frame.name: Terrorism
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits a violent or otherwise harmful <fen>Act</fen> upon a <fen>Victim</fen> in order to coerce or terrorize a government or populace. The <fen>Act</fen> may be committed in particular for political or ideological reasons, and is often directed at civilians, as opposed to government or military officials. It is most often in violation of one or many laws.
<ex><fex name="Terrorist">Their</fex> <fex name="Act"><t>terrorism</t></fex> <fex name="Victim">against civilians</fex> will not be tolerated.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Terrorist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits the <fen>Act</fen> of terror for political or ideological gains.
<ex>Several domestic <t><fex name="Terrorist">terrorists</fex></t> were operating from the site during the mid 1990s.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Act
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Act</fen> is the harmful action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or terrorist organization.
<ex>Many have suffered due to their acts of <fex name="Act"><t>terrorism</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Victim
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Victim</fen> is most directly affected or harmed by the <fen>Act</fen> of terrorism.
<ex>Cowardly acts of <t>terrorism</t> <fex name="vic">upon innocent men, women, and children</fex> is not a doorway to Heaven, but a gateway to Hell.</ex>
<ex>Never have I seen such <t>terrorism</t> <fex name="vic">on Christians</fex> in Pakistan before.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Organization
FE.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Terrorist</fen> may be part of a larger group or <fen>Organization</fen> of such people.
<ex>Several <fex name="org">Pioneer Liberation</fex> <t>terrorists</t> were arrested earlier today.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any characterization or evaluation of the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or <fen>Act</fen>.
<ex>The <fex name="des">armed</fex> <t>terrorists</t> were caught on tape.</ex>
<ex><t>terrorism</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The intermediate action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> in order to comit the <fen>Act</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The location in time when the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The action or state-of-affairs that the <fen>Terrorist</fen> is trying to accomplish by commiting the <fen>Act</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> in order to inflict harm or commit the <fen>Act</fen>.
<ex>The most recent threat to our security is <fex name="ins">biological</fex> <t>terrorism</t>.</ex>
<ex>Large-scale <fex name="ins">CBW</fex> <t>terrorism</t> is a constant worry to those in power.</ex></def-root>
